meanings.definition: Located on a higher floor or level in a building.
meanings.sent1: The cozy upstair room had a beautiful view of the city skyline.
meanings.sent2: The upstair apartment was quieter than the one on the ground floor.
meanings.sent3: The upstair cat loved to watch the birds from the window.
meanings.sent4: Her upstair dreams always seemed closer to the stars.
meanings.sent5: The upstair balcony provided a peaceful retreat from the bustling street below.

meanings.definition: Moving or going towards a higher floor or level in a building.
meanings.sent1: The upstair elevator was out of order, so they took the stairs.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sense of accomplishment every time she climbed the upstair steps.
meanings.sent3: The upstair race to the top was filled with laughter and excitement.
meanings.sent4: Their upstair journey was met with unexpected challenges along the way.
meanings.sent5: The upstair climb required determination and perseverance to reach the top.
